articles.title: Is TikTok Back in India? Viral Message of TikTok 'Pro' App May Steal Your Data - News18
articles.description: TikTok Pro is not real. However, alleged hackers are taking advantage of a trending keyword to attempt a brute force malware attack – something that is very common in today's cyber crime space.
